code: export const renderArtist=artist=>{if(artist==undefined){return'N/A';}let value='';if(artist!=null||artist!=undefined){if(artist.length>0){artist.forEach((e,i)=>{value+=e.artists.fullName+' & ';});if(value.length>1){return value.substring(0,value.length-2);}}}return'N/A';};export const isObject=obj=>{return obj===Object(obj);};export const isString=obj=>{return obj===String(obj);};
